title: AFTER DOWNLOADING THE SETUP THE INGAME DOWNLOADING IS VERY SLOW
body: 1. I DOWNLOADED THE GAME A WEAK AGO AND INSTALLED IT AFTER LOGING IN IT STARTED DOWNLOADING ABOUT 14881.9 MB DATA IT IS ABOUT THE SIZE OF 1.5 GB MY NET SPEED IS 200KBs BUT THIS DOWNLOAD IS TAKING MORE THAN A DAY. USUALLY A DOWNLOAD OF 2 GB TAKES ABOUT ONE AND A HALF OR TWO HOURS ON MY NET.I TRIED REINSTALLING IT BUT IT DIDNT WORK PLEASE HELP ME . I AM EAGER TO PLAY LEAGUE OF LEGENDS.

replies.body:
POROCELES THANK YOU FOR YOUR REPLY 
I AM HAVING AN ISSUE OF CLIENT UPDATE NOT THE ALPHA BUT THE STARTING CLIENT OF GAME.
PLEASE HELP ME.

Your network might be struggling when trying to grab updates from the patching service.  If you stop the process at any time, you'll restart the whole process again, so it's important to let it finish.  Once finished, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your comms.  I hope that helps!
